author: brett
msg: Preliminary step to generate satellite resources using MSBuild, until
NPANDAY-254 is completed and they are generated natively using AL. This
should be altered once that is the case. At the moment, the assemblies are
not relocated to the target directory or attached to the project - each
project will need to handle them individually

author: brett
msg: Currently, satellite assemblies are only generated if MSBuild is used.
Include those in the package. This will likely need to be adjusted once they
are generated normally, to ensure they end up in the right directory for each
